hudson.tasks.Shell.command: BASEURL=`readlink -f ${WORKSPACE}/../../repo-mirror/workspace/` [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/.git ] || git clone ${BASEURL}/bootstrap.git ${WORKSPACE} git pull ./autogen.sh --disable-mozilla --disable-binfilter --with-junit=${HOME}/.jenkins/junit-4.9b2.jar --with-num-cpus=4 --with-max-jobs=4 cat ${HOME}/.jenkins/set_tarfile_location.sh >> LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh echo 'export CC="ccache gcc"' >> LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh echo 'export CXX="ccache g++"' >> LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh ./download ./g stash save ./g pull -r ./g -f stash pop ./g branch -v . $WORKSPACE/LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh && cd $SOLARSRC/instsetoo_native && $SOLARENV/bin/build.pl --all -P4 -- -P4 . $WORKSPACE/LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh && cd $SOLARSRC/smoketestoo_native && dmake localinstall . $WORKSPACE/LinuxX86-64Env.Set.sh && cd $WORKSPACE && $SOLARENV/bin/subsequenttests -j5 -k
